headline: Barclays bullish on Kimco, Federal Realty as it launches coverage of retail REITs
summary: Investing.com -- Barclays starts coverage of retail REITs, rating Kimco Realty (NYSE:KIM) and Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:FRT) Overweight while it was Equal weight on Regency Centers (NASDAQ:REG), Phillips Edison, Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) and Tanger.

raw.headline: Barclays bullish on Kimco, Federal Realty as it launches coverage of retail REITs
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Barclays starts coverage of retail REITs, rating Kimco Realty (NYSE:KIM) and Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:FRT) Overweight while it was Equal weight on Regency Centers (NASDAQ:REG), Phillips Edison, Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) and Tanger.

headline: Barclays begins coverage on six U.S. shopping center REITs, rates 2 stocks Buy
summary: Investing.com -- Barclays has initiated coverage on six U.S. real estate investment trusts (REITs) in the shopping center and mall/outlet sectors, assigning Overweight ratings to Kimco Realty (NYSE:KIM) and Federal Realty Investment Trust (NYSE:FRT).
